name: Pixel Earth Research
description:
Pixel Earth Research

Human control:
Left / Right: A and D
Jump: Space bar

Rocket control:
Left / Right: A and D
Up / Down: W and S

Enemies:
Jump against its head (when controlling the rocket, just avoid them).

You can play in browser, or download the file (Windows).

Music from opengameart.org, by Centurion_fo_war.
